extendedInfo.description: â Please email our support team before leaving negative feedback. We can't respond to feedback in Google Play, and we may be able to help you. Thanks! ââââââSee thousands of real success stories and race photos of your fellow runners using the C25KÂ® program at Facebook.com/c25kfreeâââââ "C25Kâ¢ will help you in meeting and exceeding your running or walking goals with itâs plethora of built in features." - Appyzilla.com âââââ "Here at Eat Apple News we love C25Kâ¢ because it helped many of us get back into shape. It will exceed your expectations while keeping you on track with your fitness goals." - EatAppleNews.com C25Kâ¢ is the easiest program to get beginners from couch potatoes to 5K distance runners in 8 weeks. This program will allow users to slowly build strength and stamina by alternating between walking and running, and only 3 days a week. After just 8 weeks, you will be fitter, stronger and healthier than you have ever been. Listen to your favorite music while you workout and follow the programâs convenient audio alerts. Along with voice/audio alerts and music controls on your headset, just press âstartâ, put your device in your pocket, and youâre ready to go. Alerts will tell you when to warm-up, walk, run, halfway point, cooldown, and when one minute is left to give it your all. By design, the program allows (and recommends) ample time in between workouts for muscles to heal and rest. So when users begin each workout, they are at their peak condition and ready to rock and roll. â Proven 8 week program to get you running 5kâ Easiest 5k program at only 3 times/weekâ Listen to your own favorite music and playlists while you train â Easy and intuitive interface. Nothing to learn! â Convenient audio coach and alerts â Compatible with Nike+ GPS â Integrated with Facebook and Twitter communities. Meet other runners! â The only C25K app that works accurately while your device is locked!The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â® Zen Labs has chosen to support The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â® in the fight against breast cancer. By using our apps to improve your health and quality of life, you are directly contributing to this cause. We will donate five percent of your purchases to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â®. Legal Disclaimer This app and any information given by it or by Zen Labs LLC are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

reviews.title: Great program.
reviews.comment: Love having the music along with the prompts.
reviews.author: Wendy Timmons

reviews.title: Only Four stars
reviews.comment: Would get Five stars if my music stayed on.
reviews.author: C.R. Gamble

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: Great app easy to use. Gets u through the workout with ease
reviews.author: Tim Hunter

reviews.title: No network? No app.
reviews.comment: I work out in gyms with thick concrete walls and no WiFi.  No network and no WiFi = no app.  The app just sits for who knows how long, trying to contact their servers (for what reason? I paid for it, no ads.) and won\'t even let you start your workout while it fails to timeout. (a first-year CS student could help you with that whole deal)  PLEASE make this app work off network, PLEASE!
reviews.author: xeper caz

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Well its a good app to be honest but I have a bug problem... I keep having to uninstall and reinstall the app because the icon disappears so I can\'t find it.  I did email got no response left it 5 days. I\'ll give it 4 stars when this fixed 5 when you put shuffle on
reviews.author: Declan Connolly

reviews.title: Week 4 and still loving it
reviews.comment: Upgraded from the free version and can\'t really tell any difference.  Still a great app for running, I mix treadmill and road running and have a Garmin forerunner so I\'m okay with no GPS feature.
reviews.author: Katie Dehner

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Most of the complaints in the reviews are gone in current version.  I have no complaints.  I would like to see a shuffle button in the music and I have emailed the Dev.  If the app stops when your screen turns off, that is just the way your phone goes to sleep and they probably can\'t help that.  Try the free version first!
reviews.author: Nic Gilding

reviews.title: Brilliant app.
reviews.comment: This got me back into running. I had had a lot of trouble with my knees running with a heel strike, I changed my technique to a fore foot strike and started this app at the same time. Because of the slow build up it allowed my calf muscles to build up and my foot to strengthen to allow for the change in technique. Now running without pain and loving it. A must have.
reviews.author: clynton druve

reviews.title: Evil voice
reviews.comment: Just when I\'m ready to quit it tells me I\'m done love thus app
reviews.author: Karen Dragland

reviews.title: Not worth the $
reviews.comment: Wish u had GPS tracking. I paid for this app and it doesn\'t track anything!! Only tells me when to jog/walk/cool down. Wish u would upgrade this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Looks nice but actually quite a basic app.   Big Negative - The app does not dim music to tell you to run or walk, making it quite hard to hear.   Big Positive-  It\'s easy to pick day or week.   Would love to see GPS features which could track route and share with friends.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great  for 1st timers
reviews.comment: I was straight off the couch. Will complete my 1st 5k this fall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps force closing. Went to do my workout and wouldn\'t even work. Disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: I saw no difference between this app and the free version.  Also, there is no import from the free version of you have already logged runs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic But
reviews.comment: I love this app, it\'s asteticly pleasing unlike some of the other C25k apps. The voice is nice, it does exactly what it says it does.     Would like to see background mode added at some point so I can still watch Netflix or something while training on the treadmill.    Another gripe is that when trying to sync it to my facebook account I get an \"Invalid Token\" error which I can\'t seem how to get fixed.    I have friends using this on their iPhones that love it, we\'re training together so we decided to both use the same apps. They have zero issues, android app needs updates to work out kinks/bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Workout App
reviews.comment: I signed up for a 5k and I love this app. I really feel a difference in my running. Love the design too. Clean and simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I liked the look of this, but it stops the count when the phone goes to sleep. Very sad I paid for this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stops countdown when screen off!
reviews.comment: This makes this app completely worthless $2.00 down the drain!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Been looking for a legit 5k runner program, and have finally found it. Slick UI and simple straight forward use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works great!! love it. I love how it tells me what to do. Its like I don\'t even have to think. I just to my walk enjoying the outdoors . or watch My tv when Im on the elliptical.
reviews.author: Alleigh Hays
